title: Product Review - Feature Demo

segments.speaker: David Chen
segments.text: Welcome to our monthly product review. Today we'll be demoing the new transcription features.

segments.speaker: Emma Davis
segments.text: I'm excited to show what we've built. The real-time transcription accuracy has improved to 95% in our latest tests.

segments.speaker: Frank Miller
segments.text: That's impressive! How does it handle multiple speakers in a noisy environment?

segments.speaker: Emma Davis
segments.text: Great question. We've added speaker diarization that can identify up to 10 different speakers with 90% accuracy.

segments.speaker: Grace Lee
segments.text: The customer feedback has been very positive. They especially love the automatic summarization feature.

segments.speaker: David Chen
segments.text: Excellent work team. Let's discuss the roadmap for Q2 and prioritize the enhancement requests.

transcript.full_text: Welcome to our monthly product review. Today we'll be demoing the new transcription features. I'm excited to show what we've built. The real-time transcription accuracy has improved to 95% in our latest tests. That's impressive! How does it handle multiple speakers in a noisy environment? Great question. We've added speaker diarization that can identify up to 10 different speakers with 90% accuracy. The customer feedback has been very positive. They especially love the automatic summarization feature. Excellent work team. Let's discuss the roadmap for Q2 and prioritize the enhancement requests.

summary.brief: This was a productive meeting discussing project updates and next steps.
summary.detailed: The team met to discuss current project progress, identify blockers, and plan upcoming work. Key decisions were made regarding timeline adjustments and resource allocation.

action_items.task: Share meeting notes with the team
Update project timeline in tracking system

key_points: Project is on track for Q1 delivery
New feature requests prioritized for next sprint
